content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) facing DOWN (connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (16.0,73.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (17.5,70.5) (facing furnace, has fuel)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,76.5) (output storage)
- Output inserter at (16.5,75.5) (connects furnace to chest)

### New Mining Setup at (20.5,20.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (20.5,20.5) facing RIGHT (not connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (23.0,20.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at (20.5,24.5) (output storage)

### Power Generation System at (-11.5,69.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-11.5,69.5) (working, producing water)
- Boiler at (-6.5,70.0) (now has fuel)
- Steam engine at (-2.5,70.5) (now connected to power network)
- Pipe network connecting water system (positions: (-11.5,68.5), (-10.5,68.5), (-9.5,68.5), (-9.5,69.5), (-8.5,69.5), (-8.5,70.5))
- Steam pipe network (positions: (-5.5,67.5), (-4.5,67.5), (-3.5,67.5), (-2.5,67.5), (-6.5,68.5), (-5.5,68.5))

### Coal Mining and Smelting Setup at (20.0,20.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0,20.0) facing RIGHT (has fuel, working)
- Stone furnace at (23.0,20.0) (has fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,20.5) (properly connected)
- Wooden chest at (24.5,21.5) (output storage)

### Electric Mining Setup at (15.5,15.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,15.5) (connected to power network)
- Electric furnace at (18.5,15.5) (connected to power network)
- Power pole network connecting these entities

### New Coal Mining Setup at (26.0,21.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (26.0,21.0) facing RIGHT (working)
- Stone furnace at (29.0,21.0) (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (27.5,21.5) facing RIGHT (working)
- Wooden chest at (30.5,22.5) (empty)

### New Partial Setup at (19.0,54.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (19.0,54.0)
- Wooden chest at (153.5,151.5)
- Output inserter at (151.5,151.5)

### New Iron Ore Mining Setup at (18.0,73.0) [NEW]
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (18.0,73.0) (working, output blocked)
- Stone furnace at (20.0,73.0) (working, producing iron plates)
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) (waiting for space)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Mining Drill Placement Failures
- Multiple failed drill placements at (50.0,50.0), (17.65625,54.875), (17.0,54.5), (100.0,100.0), (150.0,150.0)
- Solution:
  - Verify ore presence before placement
  - Use can_place_entity() check systematically
  - Implement terrain scanning before placement attempts
  - Choose locations with clear space and valid resources

### Entity Reference Issues
- Failed to get burner mining drill at (20.0,20.0)
- Solution:
  - Store entity references immediately after placement
  - Implement position-based lookup with tolerance
  - Verify entity existence before operations

### Setup Verification
- "No working mining drills found" error when trying to connect furnace
- Solution:
  - Verify mining
